ModMetaData.name: Quality Doors
ModMetaData.author: SteveZero
ModMetaData.description: features: - allows quality to affect doors' hitpoints and opening speed. - makes doors minimizable so you can uninstall and reinstall your doors. - increases default work to build by 1.5x for doors. - increases work to build factor of metals (steel:2x, uranium:1.57x, plasteel:1.13x) and wood (1.43x) to better align with stone's 5x.
